adjective.description: At sea but close to the shore.
examples: both mackerel and bluefish have returned to inshore waters by now

adverb.description: Toward or closer to the shore.
examples: birds heading inshore to their breeding sites

phrases: After all this excitement and another cup of coffee, we waited until white water appeared along a reef inshore of the Knivestone, the Farnes' most offshore island.
It's easy to find, night or day, by the huge stacks of its power plant, right inshore of the marina complex.
I would recommend beginning the dive just inshore of this, and to the south side.
